name: openutm
description: Cross-platform, open source UTM alternative. Easy hypervisor for everybody.

scripts.test:native: bun run --cwd apps/tauri build:frontend && cargo test --manifest-path apps/tauri/src-tauri/Cargo.toml
scripts.typecheck: bun run --cwd packages/shared-types build && bun run --cwd packages/ui build && turbo run typecheck
scripts.coverage: bun run --cwd packages/shared-types test:coverage && bun run --cwd packages/qemu-lib test:coverage && bun run --cwd packages/vm-core test:coverage && bun run --cwd packages/ui test:coverage
scripts.verify:release: bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run test && bun run test:native && bun run coverage && bun run build
